problems.title: Echo
problems.statement:
## Echo

Read a single line from standard input and print it.

### Constraints
- Input length <= 10^4

### Sample
Input:
```
hello
```
Output:
```
hello
```

problems.title: A + B
problems.statement:
## A + B

Given two integers A and B (0 <= A, B <= 10^9) on one line, print their sum.

### Sample
Input:
```
3 5
```
Output:
```
8
```
